title: Tutorial
descriptionStart:
Welcome to the FH-Aachen Rallye!

In this tutorial you will learn how to use the app, find and solve challenges.
descriptionEnd: At the end of the tutorial you will receive a small summary of the challenge.

steps.text:
Challenges can be unlocked in a variety of ways.


This challenge is unlocked by default, so you can start right away.


Other challenges will be unlocked when you scan QR codes around campus or solve other challenges.


Press 'Next' to continue.

Most challenges start with a task description.

This contains information (text and/or images) that you need to solve the challenge.

Sometimes you have to make a choice.


Select one of the options to continue.
You have chosen option A, very good!
You have chosen option B, very good!

Other challenges require you to enter an answer.


Write 'FH-Aachen Rallye' in the text field and press 'Submit' to continue.

Try again.


Write 'FH-Aachen Rallye' in the text field and press 'Submit' to continue.

If you enter a wrong answer, you might lose points (These will be explained later).


You can still simply try again.

Well done!

If you enter a wrong answer, you might lose points (These will be explained later).


You can still simply try again.

Some challenges require you to scan a QR code.


FH-Aachen Rallye QR Codes look like this:
![](tutorial/qr_code_example.png)


If you press 'Scan', the camera will open.

Make sure to grant the app permission to access the camera.

If you don't want to do that, you can also manually enter the code below the QR code.


Since this is only a tutorial, you don't have to scan a QR code.

Just enter the code 'FHAR-TUTORIAL' manually to continue.

You seem to have made a typo.

Try again.

Well done!

You have completed the tutorial.


Press 'Finish' to collect your points.


Points show other rally participants how good you are at solving challenges.
More difficult challenges give you more points.


Good luck and have fun with the FH-Aachen Rallye!
